title: Road accident claims lives of two brothers in Jhal Magsi - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
DERA MURAD JAMALI: Two brothers were killed on Monday in a collision between a speeding car and a motorcycle on Gandawah Notal Road in the Jhal Magsi district on Monday, according to Levies officials.

The brothers, identified as Mumtaz Bugti and Yaqoob Bugti, were returning home on a motorbike after attending the Uras of Pir Chital Shah Noorani when they were struck by the car.

“Both brothers were killed on the spot as they received fatal injuries,” Levies official said.

The bodies were transported to a nearby hospital, where after the completion of medico-legal formalities, they were handed over to the family.

Published in Dawn, October 7th, 2025
